/** ieda.deploy.deploy.cf.cfDeploy.selectCfList **/ Select c.id as id ,c.iaas_type as iaas_type ,app_ssh_fingerprint ,diego_yn ,deploy_status ,deployment_file ,deployment_name ,description ,director_uuid ,domain ,domain_organization ,login_secret ,paasta_monitoring_use ,ingestor_ip ,key_file ,release_name ,release_version ,task_id ,c.create_date as create_date ,c.update_date as update_date From ieda_cf c LEFT JOIN ieda_cf_diego a ON c.id = a.cf_id Where LOWER(c.iaas_type) = #{iaas}
And (a.cf_id is null || c.deploy_status = 'error')

/** ieda.deploy.deploy.cf.cfDeploy.selectCfInfoById **/ Select id ,iaas_type ,dea_memory_mb ,dea_disk_mb ,diego_yn ,app_ssh_fingerprint ,deploy_status ,deployment_file ,deployment_name ,description ,director_uuid ,domain ,domain_organization ,login_secret ,release_name ,release_version ,loggregator_release_name ,loggregator_release_version ,paasta_monitoring_use ,ingestor_ip ,country_code ,state_name ,locality_name ,organization_name ,unit_name ,email ,key_file ,task_id From ieda_cf where id = #{id}

/** ieda.deploy.deploy.cf.cfDeploy.selectCfResourceInfoById **/ Select cf.id as id ,resource.id as resource_id ,iaas_type ,dea_memory_mb ,dea_disk_mb ,diego_yn ,app_ssh_fingerprint ,deploy_status ,deployment_file ,deployment_name ,description ,director_uuid ,domain ,domain_organization ,login_secret ,paasta_monitoring_use ,ingestor_ip ,release_name ,release_version ,loggregator_release_name ,loggregator_release_version ,country_code ,state_name ,locality_name ,organization_name ,unit_name ,email ,key_file ,resource.deploy_type as resource_deploy_type ,bosh_password ,stemcell_name ,stemcell_version ,small_type_flavor ,small_type_cpu ,small_type_ram ,small_type_disk ,medium_type_flavor ,medium_type_cpu ,medium_type_ram ,medium_type_disk ,large_type_flavor ,large_type_cpu ,large_type_ram ,large_type_disk ,runner_type_flavor ,runner_type_cpu ,runner_type_ram ,runner_type_disk ,task_id From (select * from ieda_cf where id = #{id} ) as cf Left Join ieda_resource as resource On cf.id = resource.id And resource.deploy_type=#{deployType} And resource.id=#{id}

/** ieda.deploy.deploy.cf.cfDeploy.selectCfJobSettingInfoListBycfId **/ Select job.id as id ,job.seq as seq ,job.deploy_type as deploy_type ,job_id as job_id ,job.instances as instances ,job.zone as zone ,job.create_user_id as create_user_id ,job.create_date as create_date ,job.update_user_id as update_user_id ,job.update_date as update_date ,template.job_name as job_name From ieda_job_setting job, ieda_job_template template Where job.job_id = template.id And job.id =#{cfId} And job.deploy_type = #{deployType}

/** ieda.deploy.deploy.cf.cfDeploy.selectCfInfoByDeploymentName **/ Select id ,iaas_type ,dea_memory_mb ,dea_disk_mb ,diego_yn ,app_ssh_fingerprint ,deploy_status ,deployment_file ,deployment_name ,description ,director_uuid ,domain ,domain_organization ,login_secret ,release_name ,release_version ,loggregator_release_name ,loggregator_release_version ,paasta_monitoring_use ,ingestor_ip ,country_code ,state_name ,locality_name ,organization_name ,unit_name ,email ,key_file ,task_id From ieda_cf Where iaas_type = #{iaasType} And deployment_file = #{deploymentFile}
